message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a unique and high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the uniqueness and quality of the item. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $75.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway between your offer and my original offer. What do you think?
